cause.description:
In order to really enjoy the full effects of Beer Pong.. you need a solid table and good beer... So we are asking for you to donate one dollar to this cause.. It's for the children!!
1. Im going to SIU.. beer is water and you need to be hydrated.
2. It's for the children
3. I'll let you join my team... if your good
cause.mission: Play beer pong on a safe playing surface
cause.name: Beer Pong Table Donations
